title: Wardrobe Randoms: The Story Behind Astana’s Snazzy Socks and Vingegaard’s Big Red Lid
content:
Vingegaard 'honored' to represent building material supplier Bygma with custom Giro helmet; Astana has a clever reason behind its curious time trial socks and gloves curation.

Read the full article at Wardrobe Randoms: The Story Behind Astana’s Snazzy Socks and Vingegaard’s Big Red Lid on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
